Package tuition

Class Student

java.lang.Object
tuition.Student
Direct Known Subclasses:
NonResident, Resident
public class Student extends Object
A class that defines the common data items and operations for all student instances, such as a profile that includes name and major, and a method to calculate the tuition due.
Author:
Sarah McNey, Cynthia Zhu

      major - The major of the student

    • Student

      public Student(String name, String major, int creditHours)
      A constructor that creates a Student object given Strings that indicate the student's name and major, as well as an integer indicating the number of credits a student is taking.
      Parameters:
      name - : The name of the student.
      major - : The student's major, represented as a String.
      creditHours - : The number of credit hours the student is enrolled in.

    • Student

      Parameters:
      name - The name of the student
      major - The major of the student
      paymentAmount - The payment amount of the student
      lastPayment - The payment date of the student

    • setTotalPayment

      Parameters:
      totalPayment - Total payment amount

    • getCreditHourCost

      public int getCreditHourCost(int creditHourRate)
      A helper method to calculate the amount that a student needs to pay by credit hour. If a student is part-time, the method returns the student's number of credit hours multiplied by the given credit hour rate. If a student is full-time, the method calculates the number of credits exceeding 16 that the student is taking, and multiplies that quantity by the given credit hour rate.
      Parameters:
      creditHourRate - : the rate that the student is charged per credit hour.
      Returns:
      the amount that the student needs to pay by credit hour.

    • isFullTime

      public boolean isFullTime()
      A helper method to determine whether a student is full-time or not depending on the number of credit hours they are enrolled in.
      Returns:
      a boolean value indicating if the student is full-time (true) or part-time (false)

    • payTuition

      public void payTuition(double amount, Date date)
      A method to pay a student's tuition.
      Parameters:
      amount - : the amount of the payment the student made.
      date - : the date of the payment.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Represents a Student object as a String.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a String that contains information about the student.
